Text: ...Hyah!
Heheh...
Kuhhh...chhhh...!

(They may know my method of attack, but whether they
can counter it is another matter...)

(Even Templars, with their intense combat training,
can't adapt that quickly!)

(That's right. My ability to unleash magic slashes is
groundbreaking in this world...)

(It's a significant advantage that only I and Master
Shadow possess!)
Take this!
Ahh!
Aghh...!
Oh? Did you mistime your magic defense?
Ack...!

(Using a magic slash as a feint and then hurling a
slime blade straight at them... These tactics are
starting to work.)
Yup. I've definitely grown stronger!

...Abandon the retrieval of the possessed! Draw out
the battle here and corner the heretic!
Bold move...

(If there's an apparent flaw to my magic slashes,
it's that my own magic powers are finite.)

(On top of that, after being stalled, they've weighed
whether they can achieve their objective and
determined they should engage in battle with me,
their enemy.)

(The Templars' combat instincts far surpass those of
the Cult's lower ranks. I shouldn't underestimate
them.)

(...Although things might change once the so-called
Children, the leaders of the Cult, enter the fray...)

You want to play the long game? That suits me just
fine!

(What bothers me is that despite Orum being so
nearby, there's no sign of Victoria.)

(It was a likely scenario, so Lambda and I were on
the alert... Is she not showing up today?)
Grrraaaaarrr!!!
Huh?!
Aaaaaghhh!!!
Gyaahhhh!!!
Im-Impressive, Delta...!

Even the magic defenses they were relying on are
being effortlessly breached! They won't be able to
fend off Delta's attacks at this rate—

...Hey, wait a minute! What about the transport ship?
I told you I could handle the Templar troops!
These are weaklings, too! Where are the strong ones—?

Reinforcements from the port...! Have all the Cult
forces already been wiped out?!
Don't tell me you abandoned your post to come here!

You're my prey! I've set my sights on you! I'll hunt
you down!
Seriously?! Fine! Change of plans!
I'll finish them off quickly!
Don't steal my prey!
They were my targets from the start!

...Former Child and Member of the Seven Blades—
the Cult minions don't stand a chance against her
full force.

Now then, the possessed wagon... Heh. How convenient.
They've even left horses.
Hey, are you conscious? Can you speak?
*groan*
Don't worry. I'm here to rescue you.

It seems only her left shoulder...has turned into a
mound of flesh. If it's only progressed this far,
saving her should be no problem.
Zinaida...is that...you...?
Huh?!
